short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring back Fruit Ninja Classic and Unblocked version for Chrome! Offline and popup! Let's Play!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Fruit Ninja Classic, the addictive fruit-slashing game, is now available as a Chrome Extension. Immerse yourself in a juicy slicing frenzy right from your Chrome browser. Swipe your finger to slice and dice various fruits while avoiding the bombs.

With the Fruit Ninja Classic Chrome Extension, you can experience the fast-paced gameplay and satisfying fruit-slicing action directly in your browser. Test your reflexes and aim for high scores as you slice through cascades of fruits, unlocking new blades and backgrounds along the way.

Whether you're a fan of casual games or seeking a fun and engaging experience, the Chrome Extension version of Fruit Ninja Classic offers a convenient and accessible way to enjoy this popular game. Get ready to unleash your inner ninja and slice your way to fruity victory in this captivating game available at your fingertips.
Note: After installing the extension, upon clicking on the browser action button, the game popup appears with options of Unblocked games and Web version for Fruit Ninja Classic!
long.en_AU,en_US,fi,ru,vi:
Fruit Ninja Classic Unblocked Game is a fun and addictive arcade game available as a Chrome extension. In this fruit-slicing frenzy, you become a skilled ninja armed with a katana, and your objective is to slice and dice as many fruits as possible while avoiding the bombs. With swift and precise swipes, you can unleash impressive combos and rack up high scores. The game features vibrant graphics, satisfying cutting effects, and catchy background music that adds to the excitement. The Chrome extension provides easy access, allowing you to enjoy the fruit-slashing action directly in your browser. Best of all, it's unblocked and free to play on the monkeymart.org website, ensuring that you can unleash your ninja skills without any restrictions. Get ready to slice, dice, and become a master Fruit Ninja in "Fruit Ninja Classic Unblocked Game"!

Note: After installing the extension, upon clicking on the browser action button, the game popup appears with options of Unblocked games and Web version for Fruit Ninja Classic!
If you want play more games please click on "Unblocked Games, Web Version" and click on web version for play on our website https://geometrydash.ee, https://monkeymart.org, https://drivemad.net/, https://retrobowls.org. Thanks!
